function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Tracking sensitive medical data on a public blockchain","Impact":"Risk of privacy breaches and unauthorized access to personal health information","Mitigation":"Use of private or permissioned blockchains with strict access controls and encryption","Technologies":"Private or permissioned blockchains, encryption technologies","People":"COVID-19 patients, individuals with sensitive health information","Owner":"Health institutions, government authorities"},{"Description":"Reliance on blockchain for public surveillance","Impact":"Potential for misuse of surveillance data and invasion of privacy","Mitigation":"Strict regulations and oversight on the use of blockchain for surveillance, transparent policies on data collection and use","Technologies":"Blockchain with transparent data collection and privacy-focused design","People":"General public, individuals under surveillance","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Data accuracy and reliability","Impact":"Inaccurate data may lead to ineffective tracking and response efforts","Mitigation":"Verification mechanisms, data validation processes, and regular audits of blockchain data","Technologies":"Blockchain with built-in verification and validation features","People":"Health authorities, government agencies","Owner":"Health institutions, government authorities"}]}
